title: The Best Deals at Nordstrom Summer Sale 2019
text:
36 items in this article 35 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the Retailers

Labor Day has come and gone, but Nordstrom is still going strong with what they’re calling a “Summer Sale” that (counterintuitively) runs until September 8. Nordstrom says there are discounts up to 40 percent, but we’ve found a bunch of stuff that’s up to half off, including in-season staples like rain jackets from the North Face and trendy Nike Air Max sneakers. Below, we’ve highlighted some of the best picks for women, men, home, and babies and kids.
